thread.title: Buy Moto Z, Moto M phones at great discount on 'Moto Days' sale | Zee News
thread.title_full: Buy Moto Z, Moto M phones at great discount on 'Moto Days' sale | Zee News

title: Buy Moto Z, Moto M phones at great discount on 'Moto Days' sale | Zee News
text:
Buy Moto Z, Moto M phones at great discount on 'Moto Days' sale Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 11:02 0 
New Delhi: Motorola phones are selling on huge discounts in a two-day sale event 'Moto Days' listed on Flipkart. 
Here are the details: 
The Moto Days will be up on Flipkart for two days- February 20, 21. 
Buyers can get a exchange discount of up to Rs 20,000, and flat discounts up to Rs 1,000. 
Moto Days discounts available on the entire Moto range that includes Moto Z, Moto Z Play, Moto G Turbo Edition, Moto E Power, Moto G (Second Gen), Moto M, and Moto E. 
Exchange discounts up to Rs 20,000 available on the Moto Z, Moto Z Play, and Moto M smartphones. 
Motorola also offering a flat Rs 500 off on Moto E Power and Rs 1,000 discount on Moto G Turbo Edition smartphones, which brings their price down to Rs 7,499 and Rs 8,999 respectively. 
The Moto Nexus 6's 32GB variant and 64 GB variant will cost Rs 19,999 and Rs 25,999 respectively during Moto Days celebration on Flipkart. 
The Moto G (Third Gen) 8GB variant will cost Rs 7,999 while the Second Gen Moto G 16 GB version will be available for Rs 6,999. The Moto E (2nd Gen) 4G 8GB can be bought for Rs 5,999 while the Moto E (2nd Gen) 3G 8 GB, will be available at Rs 4,999 on Flipkart. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 11:02 More from zeenews
